name: ANOIX
description: These are the voyages of the starship Anoix. Its 84-level mission to explore strange worlds, protect the ball from going outside and destroy all the bricks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or Newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 support (almost all graphics cards) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
